name: GIRLS OWN THE VOID
description:
GIRLS OWN THE VOID is a small, surreal Bitsy faux-platformer created for the 2018 Butterscotch Shenanijam, taking from the theme "VOID SANDWICH" and also inspired by this lovely picture.

Help Girly make a sandwich for Boyly!

Arrow keys/WASD to move & interact

This game unlocks the following shenanijam ACHIEVEMENTS:

  • Gameboy - Your game only uses 8-bit soundfx and is in the classic gameboy 4-color green palette
  • Maverick - Your team size is 1.

The music is "Chibi Ninja" by Eric Skiff (sometimes you just don't have enough jam time to write your own music...😭)

Also special thanks to Sean & Ayo & Ducky for their lovely hacks/tools!!!!
